details.purpose: To record activity regarding the performance of pathology tests.
details.use: Use to record activity regarding the performance of pathology tests.

items.items: Clinical activity about performing a pathology test.
Appoinment for pathology test has been made.
Appointment for pathology test has been rescheduled.
The pathology test has been performed and all associated activities completed.
The pathology test has been performed but related activities not completed.
The pathology test has been postponed.
The pathology test has been suspended.
The planned pathology test has been cancelled prior to commencement.
The pathology test has been aborted.
The pathology test was commenced but not completed successfully.

The start date and/or time for the test. This will indicate the scheduled date/time when recorded against the 'Appointment scheduled' care pathway step or the actual Start date/time in the 'Test performed' step.
The name of the pathology test (to be) performed. Coding of the specific test with a terminology is preferred, where possible.

Narrative description about the activity or care pathway step for the identified test, for example description about the performance and findings from the test, the failed attempt or the cancellation of the test.
Reason that the activity or care pathway step for the identified test was carried out, for example, the reason for the cancellation or suspension of the test.
Additional narrative about the activity or care pathway step not captured in other fields.
Structured information about the test. Use to capture detailed, structured information about method & technique etc.
Structured information about the specimen on which the test was conducted.
